post:
We are delighted to offer three specials not currently on our website. They are Dallas (TX) based and run on Openvz. We do not oversell our nodes.

These are all managed VPS and come with the following freebies:

- Free offsite backup account, you have full ftp access to it to check your own backup, no need to wait on us when you need a file in an emergency!

- Free ClientExec license and all future updates. Need it hosted for free in different dc? no problem - we can also do that for you.

$30 month - managed Free DA or Lxadmin control panel

Configure & buy

* 20GB Disk Space
* 200 GB Bandwidth
* 384MB Guaranteed Ram
* Choice of OS : centos, debian, gentoo, fedora
* Web based control panel to manage VPS (hypervm)

$50 month - managed Free DA or LXadmin control panel

Configure & buy

* 40GB Disk Space
* 400 GB Bandwidth
* 768MB Guaranteed Ram
* Choice of OS : centos, debian, gentoo, fedora
* Web based control panel to manage VPS (hypervm)

$70 month - managed Free DA, lxadmin or CPanel

Configure & buy

* 60GB Disk Space
* 600 GB Bandwidth
* 1024MB Guaranteed Ram
* Choice of OS : centos, debian, gentoo, fedora
* Web based control panel to manage VPS (hypervm)

In addition to these we can configure any spec of VPS, please contact us for more details.

All VPS come wtih 2 ips, extra are $1 each

Questions? please email sales@wisehosting.co.uk or visit https://my.wisehosting.co.uk/public
